name: BreakHack
description: BreakHack is a casual roguelike intended to provide entertainment for 10-30 minutes when you are taking a break from anything else in your life.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 1.6 Ghz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: X1950 Pro, 7900 GT Storage: 40 MB available space Sound Card: Any
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7/8/10 Processor: 2 Ghz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: HD 4770, 8800 GTX Storage: 40 MB available space Sound Card: Any
